row.process:
! Get File path : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"json_content-&$RUNID#.txt") : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_JSN_JSON#
! Creating file in the temp dir : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#) : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : IF &RET# <> 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH#" : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
